https://www.dropbox.com/home/Acoufelt%20Marketing/002%20Design/002%20Images/Acoufelt%20Photo%20Gallery/Images%20for%20Web/Heath%20-%20Vittina%20%26%20Flow/Vittina

Narrative copy:

Narrative/Website copy

The Vittina collection, with its distinct bright colour combinations and zig-zag pattern, takes its visual inspiration from intricate shell patterns. Each design within the Vittina collection has a strong zig-zag pattern, made up of a layered combination of contrasting colours. Whilst the pattern is consistent throughout the collection, each of the 6 comprising colours are vibrantly different; Pewter, Mandarin, Khaki Green, Storm, Turqouise and Platinum. These names, like a shell, are inspired by the bright yet naturally occurring colours visible in nature.  

Specification sheet copy

The Vittina collection, with its distinct bright colour combinations and zig-zag pattern, takes its visual inspiration from intricate shell patterns. Each design within the Vittina collection has a strong zig-zag pattern, made up of a layered combination of contrasting colours. The Vittina carpet tile collection is a 100% solution dyed nylon carpet tile in the 500mm x 500mm (19.7" x 19.7") square format. Available in four beautiful colourways, Vittina BarrierBack™ carpet tiles are designed for aesthetic and acoustic versatility.

Thanks!

Warm regards,


Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
